sources.title: Trigger Fingers (1939) TIM McCOYüçï COWBOY WESTERN
sources.description:
Stars: Tim McCoy, Joyce Bryant, Ben Corbett, Harley Wood
Director: Sam Newfield
In this action-packed cowboy adventure, Lightning Bill Carson and his trusty sidekick Magpie disguise themselves as gypsies to outsmart a ruthless gang of cattle thieves.

Step back into the wild frontier with a thrilling classic Western starring the legendary Tim McCoy as Lightning Bill Carson, alongside Ben Corbett, Joyce Bryant, and Harley Wood. Directed by prolific Western filmmaker Sam Newfield.

If you're a fan of Tim McCoy Westerns, Lightning Bill Carson cowboy movies, or the unforgettable PizzaFLIX Cowboy Westerns, this is a must-watch! Experience the excitement, drama, and gun-slinging action that defined the 1930s Western film era.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

metadata.Plot: Recovering a saddle with fingerprints from the Lasson County gang, Bill, Magpie, and Margaret arrive posing as Gypsies. Bill tells fortunes using cards and later checks them for fingerprints. Not finding any matches they arrive at the gang's hideout. But gang leader Lee soon realizes what's happening and they are in trouble.
metadata.Actors: Tim McCoy, Ben Corbett, Harley Wood
